{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

We can use this to say hello to anyone at all, but let's start with Hillary.

{% raw %} 
say_hello('Hillary')

'Hello Hillary!'
{% endraw %}

Let's test say_hello by passing it a test

{% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Hillary")=="Hello Jeremy!"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AssertionError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-5-ec4d94cb294a> in <module>
----> 1 assert say_hello("Hillary")=="Hello Jeremy!"

AssertionError:
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert say_hello("Hillary")=="Hello Hillary!"
{% endraw %}
